attributes.action: Reduce the tax on Paraffin to make it an affordable fuel for collectors and users of Classic Paraffin burning camp stoves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Price of Paraffin is prohibitive for the use of classic camp stoves gained and restored by serious collectors of said stoves.  Serious thought should be given to granting a license (allowing tax free Paraffin) to collectors in order to encourage the hobby and indeed, the future of these timeless classics.
